response.job_title: Quality & Quantity Petroleum Inspector At SGS
response.summary:
B.Sc. in chemical engineering at the National University of Colombia – Bogota, skilled at development, operation and optimization of chemical, oilchemical and unitary operations. Experienced in administrative, quality control management and certification processes areas, supporting international ASTM 17025 implementation, custody transfer of crude oil flow, instrumental and equipment metrological control, development and analysis of volumetric balances which include losses, intakes, incomes and outcomes flows.
Being a gatekeeper between different areas to ensure best results; national crude oil transport and planning, operations and environment, improving the KPI as gauge management system, reducing response time to customers, secure operation and compliance according to the National Hydrocarbon Agency.
Strong teamwork skills, goal-oriented approach and assertive communication at all corporate levels.
response.skills: Inglés, Estrategia, Capacidad de análisis, Auditoría, Sistema de gestión de la calidad, Control de calidad, Aseguramiento de la calidad, Ingeniería, Gestión de la calidad, Administración, Normas ISO, Aptitudes de laboratorio, Automatización, Calibración, Pruebas

profile_positions.title: Quality & Quantity Petroleum Inspector At SGS

profile_positions.description:
Guarantee quality and quantity oil certification through transport and storage operations by manual and automatic sampling under ASTM and American Petroleum Institute guidelines, crude oil Sampling and Testing, volumetric balances and loss control, gauge measurement system monitoring and control, laboratory metrologic plan fulfillment following ISO 9001and ISO/IEC 17025 standards.

Achievements
Automatization and consolidation of diary quality and quantity report, including; volumetric balances, quality parameter weighing and facilities stock.
Laboratory testing standard procedures generation under ASTM guidelines agreed with our customer.
Response time reduction in customer requirements cutting off complains linked to.
profile_positions.title: Quality & Quantity Petroleum Inspector

profile_positions.description:
Quality and quantity certification of oil transported in car tanks from production wells located in Casanare, Meta and Boyaca to CPF Cusiana trough sampling and testing of crude oil from each car tank and volume gauging with dynamic meter or scale weight.

Achievements
Automation in the generation process for volumetric reports for the production companies as well as weighting calculations of quality parameters mayor modifications.
profile_positions.title: QA/QC Petroleum Inspector

company.name: SGS
company.description:
We are SGS – the world’s leading testing, inspection and certification company. We are recognized as the global benchmark for sustainability, quality and integrity. Our 98,000 employees operate a network of 2,650 offices and laboratories, working together to enable a better, safer and more interconnected world.

Community Guidelines
Welcome to our LinkedIn page! SGS encourages all fans of this page to participate in the conversation through questions and comments. Any comments or activity arising from persons sharing or otherwise reproducing any communications published by SGS is not controlled or endorsed by SGS. 

We want to promote an informative and enjoyable environment within this community; we therefore ask that you post content that is both relevant and respectful and that you follow LinkedIn's Professional Community Guidelines; https://help.linkedin.com/app/answers/detail/a_id/34593/~/linkedin-professional-community-guidelines

Posts will be removed if they are: 
- Offensive, defamatory, discriminatory or obscene
- Fraudulent, deceptive or misleading
- In violation of any intellectual property rights
- In violation of any law or regulation
- Abusive, harassing, stalking, threatening or attacking others 
- Trolling or deliberate disruption of discussion
- Commercial solicitations or personal promotion
- Spam, link baiting or files containing viruses that could damage the operation of other people’s computers or mobile devices

Intellectual Property Statement
Except where expressly stated otherwise, all intellectual property rights, including copyright and trademarks, in any and all communications and materials in any form published by or on behalf of SGS are owned by SGS Société Générale de Surveillance SA, Switzerland.
